sentences.en: "Operating profit is rising more rapidly," he said.
sentences.cn: “营业利润增长愈加迅速，”他说。

sentences.en: After-tax profit fell by 28 percent.
sentences.cn: 税后利润减少了28%。

sentences.en: Because we need to give profit to the capital, otherwise we get no capital.
sentences.cn: 因为我们需要为了资本来获得利益，否则就得不到资本。

sentences.en: doing up houses and selling them at a profit.
sentences.cn: 把房子装修好出售并从中获利。

sentences.en: His purpose was to make a profit by improving the company's performance.
sentences.cn: 他的目标是通过提高公司的业绩来实现盈利。

sentences.en: In order to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output.
sentences.cn: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

sentences.en: It might profit you to learn about the company before your interview.
sentences.cn: 在面试之前对该公司作些了解可能会对你有帮助。

sentences.en: It yielded a profit of at least $36 million.
sentences.cn: 它带来了至少3,600万美元的收益。

sentences.en: No one was profiting inordinately from the war effort.
sentences.cn: 没有人在从战争中发大财。

sentences.en: Pretax profit surged almost twelvefold.
sentences.cn: 税前利润几乎涨到了原来的12倍。

sentences.en: Shares slid 11p to 293p after brokers downgraded their profit estimates.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人降低了他们的利润预期之后，股价下跌了11便士至293便士。

sentences.en: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.cn: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.en: Some industries, such as shipbuilding, clearly profited from the war.
sentences.cn: 某些行业，例如造船业，显然从这场战争中获利了。

sentences.en: The artist found much to his profit in the Louvre.
sentences.cn: 这位艺术家从卢浮宫受益颇多。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: The group made a pre-tax profit of £11.05 million.
sentences.cn: 该集团的税前利润为1,105万英镑。

sentences.en: The opportunities are there to make a tidy profit.
sentences.cn: 赚大钱的机会就在那儿摆着。

sentences.en: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.cn: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.en: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.cn: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

sentences.en: They are set to make a big fat profit.
sentences.cn: 他们下定决心要大赚一笔。

sentences.en: They sold their house at a healthy profit .
sentences.cn: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.en: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.cn: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.en: This year the airline will be hard-pressed to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 今年该航空公司将很难赢利。

sentences.en: What level of profit do you envisage?
sentences.cn: 你预计会有什么样的利润水平？

sentences.en: Whom would it profit to terrify or to kill James Sinclair?
sentences.cn: 恐吓或者干掉詹姆斯·辛克莱对谁会有好处？

words.tran_cn: 有利可图的；赚钱的；有益的
赢利能力；收益性；利益率

phrases.tran_cn: 利润分享，利润分摊；分红制

trans.tran_en: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to be useful or helpful to someone
to be useful or helpful to someone
to be useful or helpful to someone
